body:
> something like this: https://play.golang.org/p/VhCbdtJzwz

I have asked for a set of 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5. But your set implementation allows for any int:
```
func (s IntSet) Add(v int)
```
so it will accept 999. And how you are going to buiild set of red, blue and green?

I come from Pascal background http://www.delphibasics.co.uk/Article.asp?Name=Sets

I think Pascal Enumerations and Sets provide better readability and type safety for some scenarios. But that ship sailed long time ago.

Alex
